title: Corporate-Owned Work Profile Devices
description: Summarizes the count of corporate-owned work profile Android devices by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (corporate-owned work profile)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

title: Fully Managed Devices
description: Summarizes the count of fully managed Android devices by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (fully managed)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

title: Dedicated Devices
description: Summarizes the count of dedicated Android devices by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (dedicated)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

title: Personally-Owned Work Profile Devices
description: Summarizes the count of personally-owned work profile Android devices by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (personally-owned work profile)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

title: Device Administrator Devices
description: Summarizes the count of Android devices using device administrator mode by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (device administrator)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

title: Compliant Devices
description: Summarizes the count of compliant devices by OS description and version.
query:
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg 
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| where ComplianceState == "Compliant"
| summarize count() by OSDescription, OSVersion

title: Non-Compliant Devices
description: Summarizes the count of non-compliant devices by OS description and version.
query:
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg 
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| where ComplianceState == "Not compliant"
| summarize count() by OSDescription, OSVersion

title: Compliance Failures by Operating System
description: Summarizes compliance failures by operating system.
query:
let ComplianceLogs=
IntuneOperationalLogs 
| where OperationName == "Compliance" 
| project TimeGenerated, Properties;
ComplianceLogs
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| join (
ComplianceLogs
| extend myJson = todynamic(Properties)
| project-away Properties
| extend IntuneDeviceId=tostring(myJson["IntuneDeviceId"])
| project TimeGenerated, IntuneDeviceId
| summarize TimeGenerated=max(TimeGenerated) by IntuneDeviceId    
) on TimeGenerated
| project-away TimeGenerated1, IntuneDeviceId  
| extend myJson=todynamic(Properties)
| project-away Properties
| extend DeviceOperatingSystem=tostring(myJson["DeviceOperatingSystem"])
| summarize FailureCount=count() by DeviceOperatingSystem
| sort by FailureCount desc
